languages.text: {n}Каждое слово набатом отдается в голове — словно их подхватывают {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}мириады голосов{/d}, звенящих в ваших ушах. На мгновение вы теряете ориентацию в пространстве — кажется, словно этот нечестивый хор пытается опутать вас звучанием, не предназначенным для этого мира.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Каждое слово набатом отдается в голове — словно их подхватывают мириады голосов, звенящих в ваших ушах. На мгновение вы теряете ориентацию в пространстве — кажется, словно этот нечестивый хор пытается опутать вас звучанием, не предназначенным для этого мира.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каждое слово набатом отдается в голове — словно их подхватывают {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}мириады голосов{/d}, звенящих в ваших ушах. На мгновение вы теряете ориентацию в пространстве — кажется, словно этот нечестивый хор пытается опутать вас звучанием, не предназначенным для этого мира.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if myriads of voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

{n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if myriads of voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

{n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if countless voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

{n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if countless voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

{n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if countless voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}每个字都像钟声一样，响彻你的脑海，仿佛{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}无数声音{/d}加入了这场颂唱之中，在你耳边尖叫着。有那么一瞬间，你仿佛迷失了方向。这邪恶的和声肯定是打算用来自另一个世界的声音来迷惑你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}每个字都像钟声一样，响彻你的脑海，仿佛无数声音加入了这场颂唱之中，在你耳边尖叫着。有那么一瞬间，你仿佛迷失了方向。这邪恶的和声肯定是打算用来自另一个世界的声音来迷惑你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada palabra resuena en tu cabeza como una campanada, como si {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}innumerables voces{/d} la gritaran a tus oídos. Te desorientas por un instante. Este coro impío está intentando confundirte con sonidos ajenos a tu realidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada palabra resuena en tu cabeza como una campanada, como si innumerables voces la gritaran a tus oídos. Te desorientas por un instante. Este coro impío está intentando confundirte con sonidos ajenos a tu realidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}言葉が一つ一つ、鐘の音のように頭の中で鳴り響き、あたかも{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}無数の声{/d}が加わって耳に叫び声を上げているかのようだ。あなたは、これにより一瞬、方向感覚を失くす。この不浄なコーラスは、この世のものではない音であなたを混乱させようとしているに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一つ一つの言葉が、鐘が鳴り響くように頭の中で鳴り響き、あたかも無数の声が加わって耳に叫び声を上げているかのようだ。一瞬、あなたは方向感覚を失くします。この不浄なコーラスは、この世のものではない音であなたを混乱させようとしているに違いない。{/n}
{n}言葉が一つ一つ、鐘の音のように頭の中で鳴り響き、あたかも{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}無数の声{/d}が加わって耳に叫び声を上げているかのようだ。あなたは、これにより一瞬、方向感覚を失くす。この不浄なコーラスは、この世のものではない音であなたを混乱させようとしているに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chaque mot résonne dans votre tête à la manière d'un glas, comme si {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}d'innombrables voix{/d} s'étaient jointes pour hurler dans vos oreilles. Vous perdez brièvement vos repères ; ce chœur impie semble chercher à vous désorienter avec des sons qui ne devraient pas retentir en ce monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaque mot résonne dans votre tête à la manière d'un glas, comme si d'innombrables voix s'étaient jointes pour hurler dans vos oreilles. Vous perdez brièvement vos repères ; ce chœur impie semble chercher à vous désorienter avec des sons qui ne devraient pas retentir en ce monde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jedes Wort tobt durch deinen Kopf wie das Läuten einer Glocke, als hätten {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}unzählige Stimmen{/d} eingestimmt und brüllten dir direkt ins Ohr. Für einen Augenblick verlierst du die Kontrolle – dieser unheilige Chor versucht, dich mit Tönen zu beeinflussen, die nicht für diese Welt gedacht sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jedes Wort tobt durch deinen Kopf wie das Läuten einer Glocke, als hätten unzählige Stimmen eingestimmt und brüllten dir direkt ins Ohr. Für einen Augenblick verlierst du die Kontrolle – dieser unheilige Chor versucht, dich mit Tönen zu beeinflussen, die nicht für diese Welt gedacht sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her kelime zihninde, çalan çanlar gibi çınlıyor. Sanki {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}sayısız ses{/d} birleşmiş de kulağının dibinde bağırıyor gibi. Bir anlığına kafan allak bullak oluyor. Uğursuz koro, bu dünyada yeri olmayan seslerle aklını karıştırmaya çalışıyor olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}countless voices{/d} have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Each word rings through your head like the tolling of a bell, as if countless voices have joined in, screaming into your ears. For a moment, you lose your bearings — this unholy chorus must be trying to confound you with sounds not meant for this world.{/n}
